body:
"I believe you need to work in meters"

That is true, however for daylight analysis as far as everything is in the same units, and parameters are set correctly (e.g.-ad) it should work fine.



Dennis,

Have you watched any of the Honeybee workshop videos for daylighting by any chance? That should be a great place to get started as a beginner ([https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLkjfDmSc5OryXkWSt57ltJFU4qXD...](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLkjfDmSc5OryXkWSt57ltJFU4qXD5ss1v)).
